trans-unit.source: Imports ActiveX controls and generates a wrapper that can be accessed by a designer.
To generate an ActiveX wrapper for an ActiveX control, first create or obtain an instance of the AxImporter class.

The AxImporter constructor accepts an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options> object, which sets options for the importer, such as the filename for the wrapper .dll to generate and the output directory to generate the wrapper to.
To generate the ActiveX wrapper, call the appropriate Generate method.
To generate from a file, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.GenerateFromFile%2A>.
To generate from a type library, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.GenerateFromTypeLibrary%2A>.
The string that is returned will consist of an assembly qualified name (example: "Namespace.Type,Assembly") for the type an ActiveX wrapper was generated for.

The wrapper for the ActiveX control will be generated in the .dll file specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options.outputName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options> passed to the AxImporter constructor.
The type can be loaded or queried using <xref:System.Reflection> and treated as an ordinary managed type.
You can also call the `GetOcx` method of the type to retrieve a COM interface to the object, if the object supports this.
To be added.
Gets the names of the assemblies that are generated for the control.
An array of names of the generated assemblies, or an empty string array if no assemblies have been generated.
Gets the names of the source files that were generated.
An array of file names of the generated source files, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if none exist.
Gets the attributes for the generated type library.
An array of type <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR"></xref> that indicates the attributes for the generated type library.
Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
A <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> indicating the file that contains the control.
An assembly qualified name for the type of ActiveX control for which a wrapper was generated.
A type library could not be loaded from file.
Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib"></xref> that indicates the type library to generate the control from.
An assembly qualified name for the type of ActiveX control for which a wrapper was generated.
No registered ActiveX control was found in typeLib.
Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib"></xref> that indicates the type library to generate the control from.
The <xref:System.Guid> for the control wrapper.
An assembly qualified name for the type of ActiveX control for which a wrapper was generated.
No registered ActiveX control was found in typeLib.
Gets the path and file name to the specified type library.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR"></xref> that indicates the type library to retrieve the file name of.
The path and file name to the specified type library, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the library could not be located.
